territory.notes: Part of the Leeward Islands colony of Great Britain from the 17th century to 1956. The Leeward Islands colony was defederated in 1956. Members of the West Indies Federation from 1958 to 1962. Antigua (and Barbuda, its dependency) was an associated state of the United Kingdom from 1967 to 1981; it was internally self-governing, but the United Kingdom was responsible for defense and external affairs. In 1981, Antigua and Barbuda became independent, joining the Commonwealth.
